name: Pizza Tower: Peppino's Xmas Break
description:
Peppino was just preparing to settle in his Christmas break when Saint Nicholas himself snatched him away. Father Christmas asked Peppino a favor: "Ive heard that you are well versed in tower-destroying and I need your help! This Xmas tower is sucking out all of the holiday spirit in this land! You have to take it down Peppino, I dont want to deal with some nasty demolition man!". Scared to disobey the fat man in red and to slim out his chance of getting a working pizza stove for Christmas, Peppino decides to work an extra day to take on this ridiculously morbid tower of spiritual absorption.
